## FunctionCallNode.getType() method

Gets the output type for a specific output slot

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected getType(id: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The output slot ID (1-based)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The type of the output value

## Remarks

Returns the type declared by the corresponding FunctionOutputNode in the function's blueprint.
